Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

La Marseillaise, S. 237

1840 · LW A236 · R. 95

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a song by Claude Joseph Rouget de Lisle that is best known as the French national anthem.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/13 · Z. A/B 12402 · Free Arrangements XIII · ed. Péter Bozó / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3.5
